name: OR_LOG_PHYS_IMPAIR
description: The OR_LOG_PHYS_IMPAIR table contains OR management system log patient physical impairments.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log that the physical impairment refers to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the physical impairment in the surgical log.

columns.name: PHYS_IMPAIRMENTS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value that refers to the physical impairment that the patient has in the surgical log.
